objects.specification: A smooth durable classroom floor surface with a subtle textured finish in a neutral grey tone, designed to support furniture and foot traffic comfortably.
A tall flat vertical wall painted in a soft light pastel tone, forming the front boundary of the classroom with a clean smooth finish ideal for mounting boards and clocks.
A rear interior wall painted in a light neutral hue with a subtle dinosaur motif texture integrated into the finish, creating an educational themed backdrop.
A side wall painted in a light hue with a smooth finish, serving as a mounting surface for educational posters and enhancing the classroom ambiance.
A side wall finished in a light pastel color with a smooth texture, providing visual continuity and space for displaying charts and maps.
A solid rectangular teacher's desk crafted from natural light wood with smooth rounded edges, a sturdy base, and a spacious tabletop showcasing a clear wood grain finish.
A sleek interactive whiteboard with a slim black metal frame and glossy white surface, featuring integrated touch sensors and a minimalist modern design.
